migrationPath.description: Optional. Specify the migration path for which the wave plan report is to be generated. If not specified, the default will be used

values.name: Rehost
values.description: Rehost: Also known as 'lift and shift', this strategy involves moving existing applications to Azure without modification.

values.name: Refactor
values.description: Refactor: Often referred to as 'lift, tinker, and shift', this involves making minor modifications to the application to take advantage of Azure's cloud capabilities.

values.name: Rearchitect
values.description: Rearchitect: This approach involves significant changes to the application's architecture to fully utilize cloud-native features and scalability of Azure.

values.name: Rebuild
values.description: Rebuild: Involves completely redesigning and rewriting the application from scratch to be cloud-native, leveraging Azure's advanced services.

values.name: Replace
values.description: Replace: This strategy involves discarding the existing application and replacing it with a new Azure solution or a SaaS platform.

values.name: Retire
values.description: Retire: This strategy involves discarding the existing application and replacing it with a new Azure solution or a SaaS platform.

values.name: Retain
values.description: Retain: Keeping certain applications in the current environment when they are not suitable for cloud migration or when the timing is not right.

values.name: Replatform
values.description: Replatform: This strategy involves making more substantial changes to the application.

properties.description: The resource-specific properties for this resource.

Entity tags are used for comparing two or more entities from the same requested resource. TaskListResult.description: The response of a Task list operation.

value.description: The Task items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

provisioningState.description: The status of the last operation.

isEditable.description: Indicates whether the task is editable.

TaskScope.description: TaskScope can be either 'Wave' or 'MigrationEntity' or 'MigrationEntityGroup'

values.name: Wave
values.description: Wave task - typically related to a specific wave of migration

values.name: MigrationEntity
values.description: Migration Entity task - typically related to a specific migration entity

values.name: MigrationEntityGroup
values.description: Migration Entity Group task - typically related to a specific migration entity group

count.description: The count of tasks with this status.

statusCounts.description: Status counts dictionary mapping TaskStatus to the count of tasks with that status.

aggregatedStatus.description: Aggregated status of tasks in this stage.

statusCounts.description: Counts of tasks in this stage by status.

tasks.description: List of tasks in this stage.

values.name: UserDefined
values.description: UserDefined task - typically initiated by a user

values.name: SystemDefined
values.description: SystemDefined task - typically initiated by the system
